name: Winter Wonderland (KeatonBrown)
description:
Explore a winter environment with many things to find such as a train, snowmen, and dancing penguins!

Controls:

W or Up arrow: Move Forward

A or Left arrow: Move Left

S or Down arrow: Move Backward

D or Right arrow: Move Right

Spacebar: Jump

Mouse Movement: Camera Control

Credits:

Snowmen: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/free-snowman-105123

Christmas Decorations: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vegetation/trees/polycraft-christmas-tr...

Rocks: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/exterior/stones-40329

Trees: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/landscapes/handpainted-for...

Train: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/children-s-wooden-toys-free-train...

Penguins: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/animals/birds/imperial-pengu...
